text:
ChartMogul | Software Engineers | Berlin, Germany | ONSITE, VISA

We build business intelligence software. Our main BI product solves important problems for the 1000s of orgs using it. We're an international team - ChartMogul is built by people from 13 different countries.

Engineering roles include:

  - Backend
  - Backend (Integrations)
  - DevOps
  - Frontend
  - Lead (Data Processing)
  - Lead (Integrations)
More info at https://jobs.chartmogul.com/
